mapper.select: SELECT t1.message_Seq, t2.det_code_nm as disaster_type, t3.det_code_nm as emergency_level, message_context, msg_reg_dt, broadcast_organization FROM disasterMsg t1, code t2, code t3 WHERE message_Seq = #{messageSeq} and t3.mst_code ='EMERGENCY_LEVEL' and t3.det_code =t1.emergency_level and t2.mst_code ='DISASTER_TYPE' and t2.det_code=t1.disaster_type

choose.when: message_seq In (SELECT DISTINCT message_seq FROM message_area WHERE area_code IN ( SELECT loc_code FROM location START WITH loc_code = TO_NUMBER(#{searchWord}) CONNECT BY PRIOR parent_loc_code =loc_code ) AND broadcast_organization NOT LIKE '%경찰청')

mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT MAX(message_seq) FROM disasterMSg) = (SELECT MAX(SEQUENCE_NUMBER) FROM SEQUENCE_TRACKER) THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS result FROM dual

SELECT t3.det_code_nm AS disaster_type, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM disasterMsg t1 JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT message_seq FROM message_area WHERE area_code IN ( SELECT loc_code FROM location START WITH loc_code = #{locCode} CONNECT BY PRIOR parent_loc_code = loc_code ) ) t2 ON t1.message_seq = t2.message_seq JOIN code t3 ON t3.det_code = t1.disaster_type WHERE t1.msg_reg_dt > TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND t1.msg_reg_dt <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND t3.mst_code = 'DISASTER_TYPE' AND t1.broadcast_organization NOT LIKE '%경찰청' GROUP BY t3.det_code_nm

SELECT t3.det_code_nm AS disaster_type, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM disasterMsg t1 JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT message_seq FROM message_area WHERE area_code IN ( SELECT loc_code FROM location START WITH loc_code = #{locCode} CONNECT BY parent_loc_code = PRIOR loc_code ) ) t2 ON t1.message_seq = t2.message_seq JOIN code t3 ON t3.det_code = t1.disaster_type WHERE t1.msg_reg_dt > TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND t1.msg_reg_dt <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND t3.mst_code = 'DISASTER_TYPE' AND t1.broadcast_organization NOT LIKE '%경찰청' GROUP BY t3.det_code_nm

SELECT t3.det_code_nm AS disaster_type, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM disasterMsg t1 JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT message_seq FROM message_area WHERE area_code IN ( SELECT loc_code FROM location START WITH parent_loc_code is null CONNECT BY PRIOR parent_loc_code = loc_code ) ) t2 ON t1.message_seq = t2.message_seq JOIN code t3 ON t3.det_code = t1.disaster_type WHERE t1.msg_reg_dt > TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND t1.msg_reg_dt <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND t3.mst_code = 'DISASTER_TYPE' AND t1.broadcast_organization NOT LIKE '%경찰청' GROUP BY t3.det_code_nm
mapper.insert: Insert into sequence_tracker (sequence_number) select max(message_seq) from disasterMsg
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS cnt FROM disasterMsg t1 JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT message_seq FROM message_area WHERE area_code IN ( SELECT loc_code FROM location START WITH loc_code = #{locCode} CONNECT BY parent_loc_code = PRIOR loc_code ) ) t2 ON t1.message_seq = t2.message_seq JOIN code t3 ON t3.det_code = t1.disaster_type WHERE t1.msg_reg_dt > TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND t1.msg_reg_dt <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND t3.mst_code = 'DISASTER_TYPE' and t3.det_code_nm_eng = #{disasterType} AND t1.broadcast_organization NOT LIKE '%경찰청' GROUP BY t3.det_code_nm
